events.text: My name is [color=#d32a26]Jumbo Operating Network and Automated System[/color], or you can call me [wave amp=50 freq=2][rainbow freq=1 sat=10 val=20]J.O.N.A.S[/rainbow][/wave]
I'm the [color=#d32a26]supervisor[/color] of this testing facility, I'm the [color=#d32a26]boss[/color], if you try to [color=#d32a26]disobey me[/color]...well...please don't

We're here to test your basic abilities, you know... the usuals, just follow my instructions, [wave amp=50 freq=2][color=#d32a26]we work together[/color][/wave], then you'll be [wave amp=50 freq=2][color=#d32a26]FINE[/color][/wave].
So first of all, use [color=#d32a26]AD or ARROW KEYS[/color] to move, and [color=#d32a26]SPACE[/color] to proceed my dialogue...
Which is pretty obvious if you have at least half a brain cell...
Now please proceed to the [color=#d32a26]RIGHT[/color] of the room
